messages.content: It's been an honour to serve as your local MP over the past five years. I have assisted many thousands of constituents individually, and working together with local people, taken up hundreds of issues. I would like to continue to deliver for Reading West.

mentions.candidate: It's been an honour to serve as your local MP over the past five years. I have assisted many thousands of constituents individually, and working together with local people, taken up hundreds of issues. I would like to continue to deliver for Reading West.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Reading West is one of those marginal seats in the country which swings towards the party of government. The vote is likely to be close between me and Ed Milibandâ€™s candidate in Reading West.

issues.economy: Nationally, Conservatives in government have put in place the policies which have led to the economic recovery in our country. It is only by having a strong economy that we can continue to deliver strong public services like the NHS and education.
issues.education: It is only by having a strong economy that we can continue to deliver strong public services like the NHS and education.
issues.health: It is only by having a strong economy that we can continue to deliver strong public services like the NHS and education.
issues.socialWelfare: The SNP has now listed what Miliband must do to get its support: higher borrowing, higher taxes, higher welfare bills and weaker defences for our country. All this would put the British economy at risk and it is people in seats like Reading West who would pay the price.

leaflet.personalStatement: It's been an honour to serve as your local MP over the past five years. I have assisted many thousands of constituents individually, and working together with local people, taken up hundreds of issues. I would like to continue to deliver for Reading West.

images.caption: Alok Sharma images with caption 'Continuing to deliver for Reading West'

leaflet.additionalNotes:
PS: please note that you also have a vote to cast in the council elections on 7 May. The Conservative Councillor candidate for Battle Ward is Michael Hey, who would also be grateful for your support.

PPS: if you would like a lift to the polling station on Election Day or want to know where your polling station is please call us on 0118 945 4881
